attributes.action: Call Upon All Labour MP's To Repay "Bend The Rules" Expenses In Full
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shameful abuse, not remotely in the spirit of integrity.  All MP's need to repay all the expenses falling within "bend the rules"

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
